metadata.title: CVE-2025-24374 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Twig is a template language for PHP. When using the ?? operator, outputescaping was missing for the expression on the left side of the operator.This vulnerability is fixed in 3.19.0.

criterions.comment: twig package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
